snippet: The premieres of works by three student composers was followed by an impressively prepared chorus drawn from high schools in the New York region in a performance of Carl Orff’s “Carmina Burana.”
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews performance by the Orchestra of St Luke's and a chorus of high school students from the New York region at Carnegie Hall.
lead_paragraph: The premieres of works by three student composers was followed by an impressively prepared chorus drawn from high schools in the New York region in a performance of Carl Orff’s “Carmina Burana.”

headline.seo: Carmina Burana Choral Project at Carnegie Hall
